wiki.text:
'Figure' may refer to:

*A shape, drawing, or representation *Figure, wood appearance *Musical figure,
distinguished from musical motif *Shaping a mirror on a reflective telescope
*Noise figure, in telecommunication *Dance figure, an elementary dance pattern
*Vivian Davis Figures, Democratic member of the Alabama State Senate *A person's
figure, human physical appearance
